channel.title: VOD on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in VOD on FinanClub

item.title: 1016 VOD
item.description: score:1016 Chances: Vodafone Group’s biggest shareholder is pushing ahead with an ambitious global expansion strategy. Vodafone secured a deal with 1&1 AG to provide 5G coverage in Germany, potentially boosting its market presence. Warburg Pincus is among potential suitors for Vodafone Group’s Spanish business, indicating potential business opportunities.
